attributes.action: Declare International  Workers Memorial Day on 28th April a National day of mourning
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1600 people die each year in UK while doing their job and 20000 die from work related diseases.
The country should remember them on this day, as they do in other countries and by doing so reduce this slaughter

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Declare International Workers Memorial Day on 28th April a National day of mourning."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
